Title: How Mrs. Murray Saved the American Army
Actors: Miriam Nesbitt, Mabel Trunnelle, Charles Ogle
Plot: During the American Revolution, Mrs. Murray (Miriam Nesbitt), a spirited American wife, pretends to welcome the British command into her home, While they gorge on her enormous meals, she steals their maps and papers and dispatches them to the Continental troops under General George Washington (Charles Ogle).
